member.name: T:Bytewizer.TinyCLR.Logging.Debug.DebugLogger
member.summary: A logger that writes messages in the debug output window only when a debugger is attached.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The minimum level of log messages to filter messages.

member.summary: Adds a debug logger that is enabled for .Information or higher.

member.summary: Adds a debug logger that is enabled as defined by the filter function.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class that is enabled for Information or higher.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The minimum level of log messages if none of the rules match.

member.summary: Pro-actively frees resources owned by this instance.
